title: Lots of lag today?
body:
Had 3 other people dc in 5 games and I've experienced random bouts of lag throughout the game.

Anyone else?

replies.body: just you bud and I'm using my phones hotspot lol
If he's saying 3 others in 5 games, can't assume it's just him

all got bad modem needs one of these https://www.google.com.au/shopping/product/17962980157616402309?q=best+modem+router&biw=1920&bih=926&bav=on.2,or.r_cp.&bvm=bv.117868183,d.dGY&tch=1&ech=1&psi=AiL3VrKdH4S9mgXZmaPYCA.1459036751534.7&prds=paur:ClkAsKraXxw3prh1Moo9eStk0iF5wrJGVXi017vdHW04n7XFvYK-LDAiSXfifUK1sfQe4rxwRLS4i02jaY-yxaJyw6uGXou5VLop5gcGGB944h-Sq_yI1v6L3hIZAFPVH71wDkkJGzvXbHjg9b3EtcMApTW0vQ&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwi8psLeyN_LAhUDiKYKHdsEArUQ8wII6wIwAA that's what I got so good
well, truth is it started to happen after the recenlty updated patches. cannot play smoothly + constantly increasing ping these days :/

Yeh man, i've played quite a few games today and 1 completely random was laggy as hell, unplayable. I'd just played a ranked game before that and carried. came back half an hour later and it was fine. GG riot servers
